name: Pokédex
text: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and rearrange them as you like.

effect.text: Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck and rearrange them as you like.

synergies: Bill/Professor Oak - Know what you'll draw

competitiveHistory: Pokédex saw occasional play for deck manipulation, but was generally overshadowed by cards that actually drew.

rulings.ruling: You can look at fewer than 5 cards if you choose.
You rearrange the cards in any order and put them back on top of your deck.
